overview: Upon meeting her handsome new neighbor, Stella proposes that he enter her kinky world of hotwifing. A fully blindfolded Sofi anxiously awaits a sexual encounter set up by her husband. Eager to please her husband’s kinks, the neighborhood stud Ramon meets a deprived and bound Kendra, who’s ready to see what all the fuss is about. A couple’s sexual desires take shape when they agree that a trustworthy friend is perfect for the task.
title: A Hotwife Blindfolded 3
